description:
The leader of three YOUKAI-NINGEN, carrying out his own justice at any time. He has a faith that "by defeating evil and saving human being, someday he can become a human."
Whenever he senses a sign of the evil, he makes his appearance throughout Libra, both in Upper town and Outside. He assesses situations precisely and always prioritize the safety of other human beings. Though he is a quiet and expressionless person and appears to be cold-hearted, he treats BELA and BELO as his family and look after them.
He has a high intelligence and a tough body with special ability to control an electricity.
Source: Official page
name: Bem
